mapper.select: SELECT ncu.user_id AS userId, nc.channel_id AS channelId , nc.channel_name AS channelName, ncu.full_name AS fullName, ncu.open_id AS openId, ncu.create_time AS createTime, ncu.update_time AS updateTime, ncu.state FROM t_notify_channel_user AS ncu LEFT JOIN t_notify_channel AS nc ON ncu.channel_id = nc.channel_id ORDER BY ncu.create_time DESC LIMIT #{page}, #{size}
